content: > **multibuy coupon codes** > > any 2patterns 35% off - buy2get35 > > any 3 patterns 40% off - buy3get40 > > any 4 patterns 45% off - buy4get45 > > any 5 patterns 40% off - buy5get50 create these super cute christmas tree granny square gloves using this easy beginner-friendly crochet pattern the gloves are warm cosy and perfect for festive makes or thoughtful handmade gifts the pattern includes three sizes s m/l and xl/xl+ so you can make the perfect fit a full video tutorial is included to guide you step-by-step making this a relaxing project for crocheters of any level
